Package com.pos.sdk.printer.models

Class BitmapPrintLine

java.lang.Object
com.pos.sdk.printer.models.PrintLine
com.pos.sdk.printer.models.BitmapPrintLine
public class BitmapPrintLine extends PrintLine
Bitmap line abstraction for POIPrinterManager.

    • BitmapPrintLine

      public BitmapPrintLine(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap, int position)
      Generates a bitmap print line with the given bitmap and line alignment.
      Parameters:
      bitmap - Bitmap to print.
      position - Line alignment. 0 for left aligned, 1 for center aligned, 2 for right aligned.
